Comments.Message:
Brand new install of Windows XP with SP2 preinstalled.

Rawr b14.1. Getting the following error:

Faulting application rawr.exe, version 1.14.1.0, stamp 482c1021, faulting module kernel32.dll, version 5.1.2600.2180, stamp 411096b4, debug? 0, fault address 0x0001eb33.

For more information, see Help and Support Center at http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/events.asp.

This occurs immediately upon running the program. do I need to install a specific windows update?

That's not an error that I've seen before, or appears to be Rawr specific. I'd advise applying all available windows updates, and/or manually installing .NET Framework from the install link in the readme.
